name: Angelo Stavrow
body:
Hi.

My name is Angelo, and I like to help people solve problems.

I have a [day job](ca.linkedin.com/in/angelostavrow) as a quality engineer, have made a couple of [apps for iPhone](http://appstore.com/droppedbits?at=11ln59&ct=personalwebsite), and enjoy working on a couple of other [little projects](https://github.com/AngeloStavrow).

I also like to write about both [working](http://makebeforebreak.com/) and [playing](http://breakbeforemake.com/).

[Get in touch](https://twitter.com/angelostavrow)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
